official_title: An act to amend the National Trails System Act by adding the California Trail to the study list, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #121 (401-14)) Amends the National Trails System Act by adding the California Trail and the Pony Express Trail to the list of trails to be studied for possible designation as national scenic or historic trails. Requires that the feasibility study pertaining to both trails be completed by the end of two complete fiscal years after this amendment is enacted. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to accept the donation of suitable markers for placement along the Daniel Boone Trail to commemorate the contributions of Daniel Boone.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by adding the Oregon-California Trail to the study list.
An act to amend the National Trails System Act by adding the California Trail to the study list, and for other purposes.
